name: Corelight
description: This action supports investigative and generic actions to add configurations and update frameworks on Corelight

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using the supplied configuration

actions.verbose: Send data to the Corelight input framework.

append.description: Is this an append to the input framework? Otherwise it will overwrite

name.description: Name of the list to upload/update

fields.description: Tab-seperated listed starts with #fields separated by tabs

input.description: Information for the imput framework separated by tabs

actions.verbose: Send data to the Corelight intel framework.

is_this_a_update.description: Is this an update? If not, it will overwrite the intel feed

actions.verbose: Get a list of the different input framework endpoints.

example_values:
Files with a MIME type in this set no longer get reported
in files_red.log. This file contains a single column called
"mime_type", with each row listing a MIME type such as
"application/pdf".

actions.description: List the different input framework endpoints
Create a JSON backup of the Corelight box
Restore JSON config to the Corelight box

vault_id.description: Vault ID of the file to be detonated

example_values: The JSON bundle has been uploaded and the changes are in effect now.
